member.name: T:VRC.SDKBase.Networking
member.summary: Networking is a class that provides a set of static methods relating to the networking of UdonBehaviours.

member.name: P:VRC.SDKBase.Networking.IsNetworkSettled
member.summary: returns true once all the data in the instance has been deserialized and applied, and it's ready for use.

member.name: P:VRC.SDKBase.Networking.IsClogged
member.summary: returns true if there is too much data trying to get out. You can use this to hold off some operations or adjust your logic.

member.name: P:VRC.SDKBase.Networking.IsInstanceOwner

cannyPosts.cannyPost: This property is currently broken, and will always return true! use instead.

member.summary: if the local Player is the one who created the instance.
member.remarks: Will be False when in Build & Test and Unity Playmode.

member.name: P:VRC.SDKBase.Networking.IsMaster
member.summary: Tells you whether the local Player is the instance master.
member.remarks: This is the player who either created the instance, or the one who inherited Master status when the last Master left.

member.name: P:VRC.SDKBase.Networking.LocalPlayer
member.summary: returns the object of the local player.
member.remarks: Will be null in the editor, unless using a client emulator - use to easily branch your logic on this.
